extension.news: v1.1.0 (2024-18-10) - New fallback HDR detection for better compatibility across different Kodi platforms - New on-boarding process to test your platform's HDR detection and present offset settings accordingly. HDR10+ or advanced HLG (when Kodi thinks it's an SDR video) detection might not be available on all platforms. - New panel in settings to show your platform capabilities
extension.description: This add-on intelligently adjusts the audio offset based on the detected HDR type and audio format according to user-configured settings, along with other helpful features
